section.title: Move organisation units within a hierarchy
section.para: You can move organisation units within in the hierarchy by changing the parent of a selected organisation unit.

listitem.para: Open the Maintenance app and click Organisation unit > Hierarchy operations.
In the left-hand hierarchy tree, select the organisation unit(s) you want to move.

note.para: If the selected organisation unit is has sub-organisation units, all of them move to the new parent organisation unit.

listitem.para: In the right-hand hierarchy tree, select which organisation unit you want to move the selected organisation unit(s) to.
Click Move x organisation units, where x stands for the number of organisation units you have selected.
Your changes are immediately reflected in the left-hand side hierarchy tree.
